title: Smart Data Models - WindTurbineType1or2Dynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Parent class supporting relationships to wind turbines Type 1 and 2 and their control models.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindTurbineType1or2Dynamics

AsynchronousMachineDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Asynchronous machine model with which this wind generator type 1 or 2 model is associated. Default: None

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Remote input signal used by this wind generator Type 1 or Type 2 model. Default: None
